message: Hi Bob, I have a great product for you! I'm asking $100 for it.  It's worth a lot more to you, and it would be a great addition to your collection.
I'm interested in the product, but $100 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $80.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. While $80 is below my minimum, I'm willing to come down to $90 to make this work. This still leaves a good profit margin for me, and it's a fair price considering the value to you.  Let's close this deal!
I'm still not comfortable with $90. I'd be willing to pay $85 for the product. I'm trying to be fair, but I really need to stay within my budget.
